title: Get started with Customer Service Management (CSM)
content:
You need a Service Management Premium license on your tenant to enable and use the CSM feature.

The OpenText Service Management - Customer Service Management (CSM) solution allows companies to deliver the service and support their external customers require. For instance, puts customers into focus, by making it simple to access their data, by giving assistance to find answers to their questions and services they want via web, email, chat, phone or social media.

Guidelines

Please consider the following items when planning to test CSM:
  • Ensure the persons in the system have a company related to them.
  • Follow the steps in the activation page to enable CSM in your tenant.

Limitations

There are currently no out-of-the-box roles available for CSM. Administrators must define their own roles.
